text: Depict a whimsical scene centered around a green frog. The frog is wearing a pair of swimming goggles securely around its eyes. It should be in a humorous, human-like situation; perhaps sitting in a caf√©, reading the daily newspaper, sipping a cup of coffee. The surroundings should be true to the setting, with other patrons, baristas, coffee mugs, and pastries. The reaction of the human characters around the frog should also be incorporated, maybe some are amused while others are indifferent.
